1297.name: L-Ag30Sn
1297.Applications:
Brazing a weight range of different metals in maintanance and repair with excelent strenght, Boiler making, tubing, cooling equipment etc. The presence of tin improves the fluidity is useful to increase the activity of the flux.
Do not use this alloy above working temperatures of 200ºC .
1297.Suitable_For: Brazing: Steels, Copper, Copper alloys, Stainless steel, Nickel and Nickel alloys. Also suitable for dissimilar joints between these metals.
